short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pliny Browser Extension. Allows you to link from Xestro, ClinicToCloud or Gentu directly to the same patient in Pliny.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension to link from a patient in Xestro or ClinicToCloud directly to the same patient in Pliny.

Once installed, you can click the Pliny button and jump directly to the right patient in Pliny.

For ClinicToCloud & Gentu users, you can download your appointments into Pliny Worklists, saving your team time.

Note: Worklists requires a Pliny Subscription.
